title: Thank you to the katarina subreddit :)
body:
You gave my champion a self micro stun :) i truly appreciate it. enjoy complaining about how she is even clunkier now and she shouldnt stun herself.
GOD i cant wait to be micro stunned like akalis first R was hitting me every time i use shunpo. feels good man.

Anyway good luck with the decreasing wr kats about to get.

Edit: just saw LS say that she isn't a champion anymore. nice.

replies.body: You're still gonna play her. Plenty of champions have gotten this treatment before, suck it up and join the club.

> [{quoted}](name=Frontline Fury,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-09T04:31:03.356+0000)
>
> You're still gonna play her. Plenty of champions have gotten this treatment before, suck it up and join the club.

lol nah fam im legit launching league now to play my last game and uninstalling after that.
I dont like playing games with 150ms ping.
This nerf to kat is riot just telling everyone that they are deleting the champion. so am i deleting their game from my pc.

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T04:39:12.381+0000)
>
> lol nah fam im legit launching league now to play my last game and uninstalling after that.
> I dont like playing games with 150ms ping.
> This nerf to kat is riot just telling everyone that they are deleting the champion. so am i deleting their game from my pc.

You'll be back in a week or so.

> [{quoted}](name=Frontline Fury,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T05:16:45.981+0000)
>
> You'll be back in a week or so.

considering i quit any game i say i will quit :/ doubt. said ill quit overwatch after they gutted mercy. did it havent downloaded it since. said if they wont update csgo ill quit. (was global elite) havent played for like 6 months. :/ when i say i quit. i fucking quit.

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T04:39:12.381+0000)

> I dont like playing games with 150ms ping.
> This nerf to kat is riot just telling everyone that they are deleting the champion. so am i deleting their game from my pc.

 

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T05:41:41.208+0000)
>
> considering i quit any game i say i will quit :/ doubt. said ill quit overwatch after they gutted mercy. did it havent downloaded it since. said if they wont update csgo ill quit. (was global elite) havent played for like 6 months. :/ when i say i quit. i fucking quit.

Meanwhile, OP still playing multiple Kat games each day.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-12T03:44:46.245+0000)
>
> &nbsp;
> 
> Meanwhile, OP still playing multiple Kat games each day.

ye tru. :^) i just cant leave my imaginary gf like that. btw who the fuk upvoted u 5 minutes after u posted that comment on a 3 day old post? like wtf?
Good fucking riddance, all the kat mains hate you anyway. I hope you and your incessant bitching never come back to this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Skírmish,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2019-01-15T18:24:58.335+0000)
>
> Good fucking riddance, all the kat mains hate you anyway. I hope you and your incessant bitching never come back to this game.

you being the only one? also you dont even play the game xd

What they do exactly?!?

Did changes happen to Katarina recently?

> [{quoted}](name=King Lego,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-10T13:25:03.894+0000)
>
> What they do exactly?!?
> 
> Did changes happen to Katarina recently?

Ye they made it so everytime she uses E she stuns herself for 0.35

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-10T17:14:48.543+0000)
>
> Ye they made it so everytime she uses E she stuns herself for 0.35

Why the hell would they add a self stun before shunpo-ing?

You mean like a 0.35 delay?

What?!?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=King Lego,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2019-01-10T19:29:35.693+0000)
>
> Why the hell would they add a self stun before shunpo-ing?
> 
> You mean like a 0.35 delay?
> 
> What?!?
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

yep.

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2019-01-10T22:22:32.137+0000)
>
> yep.

Man i use to main Katarina back then before i learned the existence of Vel'Koz and switched to maining him back in 2014...

Now it's just sad to see what is happening to her.

> [{quoted}](name=King Lego,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=00030000000100000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T23:07:33.763+0000)
>
> Man i use to main Katarina back then before i learned the existence of Vel'Koz and switched to maining him back in 2014...
> 
> Now it's just sad to see what is happening to her.

You are a lucky man for having the power to switch katarina to velkoz and in time before she got fucked by riot :(

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=000300000001000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T23:53:38.448+0000)
>
> You are a lucky man for having the power to switch katarina to velkoz and in time before she got fucked by riot :(

I wouldn't call that power.
More like taste in champions.

Besides Assassins class isn't my thing. I prefer being a long range cannon.

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-10T17:14:48.543+0000)
>
> Ye they made it so everytime she uses E she stuns herself for 0.35

Uhh, no. That's how she always was. All they did was switch it from the beginning of you pressing e to the end of her teleporting. It takes the exact same amount of time to do anything lol generally speaking

> [{quoted}](name=The Highest Noon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T17:44:16.324+0000)
>
> Uhh, no. That's how she always was. All they did was switch it from the beginning of you pressing e to the end of her teleporting. It takes the exact same amount of time to do anything lol generally speaking

nop. they didnt even take away the first part. she still has 0.05 cast time in her first shunpo + 0.20 on her second and a stand still moment for 0.10 Yes i tested it out (it actually is a bug) also she cant do E Q 100% of the time. half of the time it wont buffer the Q. Also pre rework her shunpo was instant.

The self stun (also known as a "cast time") hasn't changed. Instead of moving to the target in the middle of the cast time, Kat now does so immediately. This sets it apart from most abilities, which require you to wait out the entire cast time _first_, and _then_ the effect happens.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-10T13:01:56.189+0000)
>
> The self stun (also known as a "cast time") hasn't changed. Instead of moving to the target in the middle of the cast time, Kat now does so immediately. This sets it apart from most abilities, which require you to wait out the entire cast time _first_, and _then_ the effect happens.

Yes you use E and then you stand still for 0.35 :)
GOOD. Get that trash ass champion out of the game! {{sticker:darius-angry}}

> [{quoted}](name=The Highest Noon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YnJoi66G,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-09T05:20:50.317+0000)
>
> GOOD. Get that trash ass champion out of the game! {{sticker:darius-angry}}

You're right she is complete trash, not even a champ, so it wouldn't matter if she was deleted

Why do you even give a shit about what LS says? He's an r word lmao More than half the trash he talks doesn't turn out that way anyway, he loves to dramatize everything and exaggerate out his ass.

Oh well, not like you care about anything anybody has to say about this anyway so peace. It's not a bad change.
